description: Replace placeholders with the 'Client Credentials' (client_id, client_secret) that will be used by Sinch in the OAuth
flow; they are arbitrary strings, but they have to match those you configured as 'FCM OAuth Configuration'
in Sinch Dashboard. You can check your Sinch's app configuration at https://dashboard.sinch.com/voice/apps
Replace placeholders with the 'Project number' of your Android app's FCM project.
It's needed to validate the 'fcm_project_number' field in your FCM token endpoint.
You can find the 'Project number' for your FCM project at:
